# NEAR frontend

Frontend to allow anyone to easily deploy NEAR validators using Xnode.
https://near.xnode.openmesh.network/

## Related repos

https://github.com/Openmesh-Network/near-validator/

## One click deployment

[<img src="https://www.openmesh.network/xnode/deploy-on-xnode.svg" width=200 />](https://www.openmesh.network/xnode/deploy?)

## Commands (in root folder)

```
nix run
```

## Commands (in nextjs-app)

```
npm i
npm run dev
npm run build
npm run start
```
